settings.heading: Energize Your Shop, With A Theme Built For Speed
settings.text: Roller is next generation ecommerce at its  best: an incredibly flexible and sophisticated theme that will make your shop as stunning as it is fast

settings.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.subheading: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.content:
• 100% Secure payment with SSL Encryption.
  • If you're not 100% satisfied, let us know and we'll make it right.
settings.heading: Return & Warranty

settings.content:
• Orders ship within 5 to 10 business days.
  • Tip: Buying 2 products or more at the same time will save you quite a lot on shipping fees.
settings.heading: Shipping Policies

settings.description: Your order will be produced within 7-10 days after your order is placed. Please allow us to make your own items with all our best, so we take great pride in delivering the highest quality products for our customers. So much do thank you for your patience.
settings.name: Production time

settings.description: Please wait 10-20 business days for your items to be shipped and delivered after their production. Besides, you will receive a tracking number 7-10 days after you place your order. If your tracking number does not show data, please allow up to 48 hours for the information to appear.
settings.name: Shipping time

cart_goal.cart_goal_motivational_message: Buy {{variable}} more to enjoy FREE Shipping
cart_goal.cart_goal_reach_message: Congrats! You are eligible for FREE Shipping

settings.heading: Roller theme
settings.text: From modern contemporary designs to antique collectible pieces from around the world, we create unique designs on any product by independent designers. Better your life with high quality products on Roller theme.
